# pointOfView

**Instance Property**

The node from which the scene’s contents are viewed for rendering.

## Declaration

```swift
var pointOfView: SCNNode? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Use a node with an [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNCamera] instance assigned to its [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNNode/camera] property to view a scene. The node provides the position and direction of a virtual camera, and the camera object provides rendering parameters such as field of view and focus.

For debugging lights and shadows, you can also designate a spotlight (an [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNLight] object whose [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNLight/type] property is [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNLight/LightType/spot]) as a point of view. In this case, the light’s [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNLight/spotInnerAngle] property determines the field of view, and its [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNLight/zNear] and [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNLight/zFar] properties determine the near and far extents of the region that is visible onscreen (also known as the *viewing frustum*).

In either case, the direction of view is along the negative z-axis of the node’s local coordinate space.

## Managing Scene Display

- **autoenablesDefaultLighting**: A Boolean value that determines whether SceneKit automatically adds lights to a scene.
- **isJitteringEnabled**: A Boolean value that determines whether SceneKit applies jittering to reduce aliasing artifacts.
- **showsStatistics**: A Boolean value that determines whether SceneKit displays rendering performance statistics in an accessory view.
- **debugOptions**: Options for drawing overlay content in a scene that can aid debugging.
- **renderingAPI**: The graphics technology SceneKit uses to render the scene.
- **SCNDebugOptions**: Options for drawing overlays with SceneKit content that can aid in debugging, used with the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNSceneRenderer/debugOptions] property.
- **SCNRenderingAPI**: Options for choosing the graphics technology for an [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNView] object (or other SceneKit renderer) to use for drawing its contents. Used by the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNSceneRenderer/renderingAPI] property and the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNView/Option/preferredRenderingAPI] option when initializing an [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNView] object.
